ly.img.android.pesdk.utils

Class ImageViewUtil

  • ly.img.android.pesdk.utils.ImageViewUtil

  • public class ImageViewUtil

    Utility class that deals with operations with an ImageView.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Rect getBitmapRectCenterInside(float imageWidth, float imageHeight, float viewWidth, float viewHeight)
      Gets the rectangular position of a Bitmap if it were placed inside a View with scale type set to ImageView.ScaleType.
      static MultiRect getBitmapRectFCenterInside(float imageWidth, float imageHeight, float viewWidth, float viewHeight)
      Gets the rectangular position of a Bitmap if it were placed inside a View with scale type set to ImageView.ScaleType.

      • getBitmapRectCenterInside

                                             float imageHeight,
                                             float viewWidth,
                                             float viewHeight)

        Gets the rectangular position of a Bitmap if it were placed inside a View with scale type set to ImageView.ScaleType.

        Parameters:
        imageWidth - org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@1ce61e25: the Bitmap's width
        imageHeight - org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@22642a28: the Bitmap's height
        viewWidth - org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@4dbe46e7: the parent View's width
        viewHeight - org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@2875deca: the parent View's height
        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@4ceead7: the rectangular position of the Bitmap
